## Problem
What user or developer problem does this solve?

## Proposed Change
Describe the proposed behavior and scope.

## Alternatives Considered
What alternatives did you evaluate?

## Success Criteria
How should we validate this is complete?

## Additional Context
Any links, mockups, or technical constraints.
